840729737232129082.Text: Summoning spells summon otherworldly creatures from the outer realms to ward and protect the caster for the duration of the magical effect. More common spells of this sort include: summon ancestral ghost, summon least bonewalker, summon greater bonewalker, summon skeletal minion, and summon scamp. More powerful spells of this class, like summon dremora and summon daedroth, expend too much magicka to be practical for all but master sorcerers.
